segments.text: I see the children working together to get those cookies, and it’s actually kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined, balancing on that wobbly stool like a little acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting with her hand out, and I can’t help but smile at her patience.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, completely missing the fun happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the sunlight is coming through the window, making everything look so warm and cozy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing is a bit of a mess, but it’s almost funny how no one is reacting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s face must be so excited right now, even if I can’t see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s posture is so sweet, like she’s waiting for a little gift.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is one of those moments that would make a great memory someday.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s dress is so neat, even with the water puddle growing around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
